discovery_rule.name: OSPF Interfaces
discovery_rule.description:
OSPF-MIB::ospfIfIpAddress
The IP address of this OSPF interface.

trigger_prototype.name: OSPF Interface "{#SNMPVALUE}" State has been changed

discovery_rule.name: OSPF Neighbors
discovery_rule.description:
OSPF-MIB::ospfNbrIpAddr
The IP address this neighbor is using in its IP source address. Note that, on addressless links, this will not be 0.0.0.0 but the address of another of the neighbor's interfaces.

discovery_rule.name: $1 Sensors
discovery_rule.description: The textual name of the physical entity.

item_prototype.name: Status of $2 Sensor "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB::entSensorStatus
This variable indicates the present operational status of the sensor.

item_prototype.name: Value of $2 Sensor "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB::entSensorValue
This variable reports the most recent measurement seen by the sensor.

discovery_rule.name: $1 Sensors
discovery_rule.description: The textual name of the physical entity.

item_prototype.name: $2 of Sensor "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB::entSensorValue
This variable reports the most recent measurement seen by the sensor.

item_prototype.name: Status of $2 Sensor "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB::entSensorStatus
This variable indicates the present operational status of the sensor.

discovery_rule.name: $1 Sensors
discovery_rule.description: The textual name of the physical entity.

item_prototype.name: Manufacturer of $2 "$1"
item_prototype.description:
ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalMfgName
The name of the manufacturer of this physical component. The preferred value is the manufacturer name string actually printed on the component itself (if present).

item_prototype.name: Model Name of $2 "$1"
item_prototype.description:
ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalModelName
The vendor-specific model name identifier string associated with this physical component. The preferred value is the customer-visible part number, which may be printed on the component itself.

item_prototype.name: Operational Status of $2 "$1"
item_prototype.description:
ENTITY-STATE-MIB::entStateOper
The operational state for this entity.

item_prototype.name: Serial Number of $2 "$1"
item_prototype.description:
ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalSerialNum
The vendor-specific serial number string for the physical entity. The preferred value is the serial number string actually printed on the component itself (if present).

discovery_rule.name: $1 Sensors
discovery_rule.description: The textual name of the physical entity.

item_prototype.name: $2 on Sensor "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB::entSensorValue
This variable reports the most recent measurement seen by the sensor.

item_prototype.name: Status of $2 Sensor "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB::entSensorStatus
This variable indicates the present operational status of the sensor.

discovery_rule.name: $1 Sensors
discovery_rule.description: The textual name of the physical entity.

item_prototype.name: Manufacturer of $2 "$1"
item_prototype.description:
ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalMfgName
The name of the manufacturer of this physical component. The preferred value is the manufacturer name string actually printed on the component itself (if present).

item_prototype.name: Model Name of $2 "$1"
item_prototype.description:
ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalModelName
The vendor-specific model name identifier string associated with this physical component. The preferred value is the customer-visible part number, which may be printed on the component itself.

item_prototype.name: Operational Status of $2 "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-ENTITY-FRU-CONTROL-MIB::cefcFanTrayOperStatus
The operational state of the fan or fan tray.

item_prototype.name: Serial Number of $2 "$1"
item_prototype.description:
ENTITY-MIB::entPhysicalSerialNum
The vendor-specific serial number string for the physical entity. The preferred value is the serial number string actually printed on the component itself (if present).

trigger_prototype.name: Status of Fan Tray "{#SNMPVALUE}" is in partial failure
Status of Fan Tray "{#SNMPVALUE}" is powered down

discovery_rule.name: CPU
discovery_rule.description:
CISCO-PROCESS-MIB::cpmCPUTotalPhysicalIndex
The entPhysicalIndex of the physical entity for which the CPU statistics in this entry are maintained. The physical entity can be a CPU chip, a group of CPUs, a CPU card etc. The exact type of this entity is described by its entPhysicalVendorType value. If the CPU statistics in this entry correspond to more than one physical entity (or to no physical entity), or if the entPhysicalTable is not supported on the SNMP agent, the value of this object must be zero.

item_prototype.name: CPU Usage 1min Rev ({#SNMPINDEX})
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-PROCESS-MIB::cpmCPUTotal1minRev
The overall CPU busy percentage in the last 1 minute period. This object deprecates the object cpmCPUTotal1min and increases the value range to (0..100).

item_prototype.name: CPU Usage 5min Rev ({#SNMPINDEX})
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-PROCESS-MIB::cpmCPUTotal5minRev
The overall CPU busy percentage in the last 5 minute period. This object deprecates the object cpmCPUTotal5min and increases the value range to (0..100).

item_prototype.name: CPU Usage 5sec Rev ({#SNMPINDEX})
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-PROCESS-MIB::cpmCPUTotal5secRev
The overall CPU busy percentage in the last 5 second period. This object deprecates the object cpmCPUTotal5sec and increases the value range to (0..100). This object is deprecated by cpmCPUTotalMonIntervalValue.

discovery_rule.name: FAN
discovery_rule.description:
CISCO-ENVMON-MIB::ciscoEnvMonFanStatusDescr
Textual description of the fan being instrumented.

item_prototype.name: Status of FAN "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-ENVMON-MIB::ciscoEnvMonFanState
The current state of the fan being instrumented.

trigger_prototype.name: Status of FAN "{#SNMPVALUE}" is not functioning

discovery_rule.name: Memory Pool
discovery_rule.description:
CISCO-MEMORY-POOL-MIB::ciscoMemoryPoolName
A textual name assigned to the memory pool.

item_prototype.name: Free memory on Memory Pool "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-MEMORY-POOL-MIB::ciscoMemoryPoolFree
Indicates the number of bytes from the memory pool that are currently unused on the managed device.

item_prototype.name: Name of Memory Pool "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-MEMORY-POOL-MIB::ciscoMemoryPoolName
A textual name assigned to the memory pool.

item_prototype.name: Used memory on Memory Pool "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-MEMORY-POOL-MIB::ciscoMemoryPoolUsed
Indicates the number of bytes from the memory pool that are currently in use by applications on the managed device.

discovery_rule.name: Power Supplies
discovery_rule.description:
CISCO-ENVMON-MIB::ciscoEnvMonSupplyStatusDescr
Textual description of the power supply being instrumented.

item_prototype.name: Status of Power Supply "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-ENVMON-MIB::ciscoEnvMonSupplyState
The current state of the power supply being instrumented.

trigger_prototype.name: Status of Power Supply "{#SNMPVALUE}" is critical
Status of Power Supply "{#SNMPVALUE}" is non-operable
Status of Power Supply "{#SNMPVALUE}" is not functioning
Status of Power Supply "{#SNMPVALUE}" is shutdown

discovery_rule.name: Temperature Sensors
discovery_rule.description:
CISCO-ENVMON-MIB::ciscoEnvMonTemperatureStatusDescr
Textual description of the testpoint being instrumented.

item_prototype.name: Status of Temperature Sensor "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-ENVMON-MIB::ciscoEnvMonTemperatureState
The current state of the testpoint being instrumented.

item_prototype.name: Temperature on Sensor "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-ENVMON-MIB::ciscoEnvMonTemperatureStatusValue
The current measurement of the testpoint being instrumented.

item_prototype.name: Threshold Temperature on Sensor "$1"
item_prototype.description:
CISCO-ENVMON-MIB::ciscoEnvMonTemperatureThreshold
The highest value that the associated instance of the object ciscoEnvMonTemperatureStatusValue may obtain before an emergency shutdown of the managed device is initiated.

item.name: Attack Filter changes
item.description: The system generates this notification to indicate that the cscaFilterStatus of the attack filter for cscaType has changed due to the reason determined by cscaDescription. The system limits the generation of this notifications for the same cscaType to a five-second interval.

item.name: BGP Peer State
item.description:
BGP4-MIB::bgpPeerState CISCO-BGP4-MIB::cbgpPeer2State
The BGP peer connection state.

item.name: OSPF neighbour state
item.description: 1 : down 2 : attempt 3 : init 4 : twoWay 5 : exchangeStart 6 : exchange 7 : loading 8 : full
